patent_validity: invalid due to lack of utility
utility: failed to demonstrate or soundly predict improvement
novelty: achieved high optical purity of 99.8%ee, inventive and not obvious
relevant_rule: valid if demonstrates or soundly predicts utility, novel, and non-obvious
procedure_followed: Federal Court analyzed claims, utility, novelty, and obviousness
result_of_case: patent declared invalid, infringement claim dismissed, counterclaim granted
